channel.title: [Bluurr's]A Few Glitches
channel.description: 1. Equipment Screen, it only shows the default char with no equipment, bonuses are fine. 2. When wearing the void melee helm, attacking a person or doing an emote will make the char's head twist in irregular ways. 3. Dark bow, spec shoots d maces, now that I fixed the d mace model (was dragon head). 4. I want to find the method which calls for the background to be flipped, where is that?

item.title: [Bluurr's]A Few Glitches
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq
item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:310308”](the numbers here correspond to what question they are answering)

1 - Use myn in the client hacking section
2 - I believe this would be an animation issue. Try re-animating the model.
3 - That means the model was over-writing the dragon mace. Get back the model and over-write something else[/quote]

For your tutorial, how would I set that server-sided?

EDIT:
For #2, a pic for the guy who wanted one:

Read full topic

item.title: [Bluurr's]A Few Glitches
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

(the numbers here correspond to what question they are answering)

1 - Use myn in the client hacking section
2 - I believe this would be an animation issue. Try re-animating the model.
3 - That means the model was over-writing the dragon mace. Get back the model and over-write something else

Read full topic

item.title: [Bluurr's]A Few Glitches
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

  1. All clients based off of Bluurr’s client has that problem.
  2. Not sure about this one, maybe some codes or a video may help?
  3. Set the GFX & Model ID to one that doesn’t replace another.
  4. In the client class, quote out/delete these:

aClass15_1110.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(382, 0, -32357); aClass15_1111.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-255, 0, -32357); aClass15_1107.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(254, 0, -32357); aClass15_1108.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(180, -371, -32357); aClass15_1109.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(180, -171, -32357); aClass15_1112.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(382, -265, -32357); aClass15_1113.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -265, -32357); aClass15_1114.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(254, -171, -32357); aClass15_1115.method237(0);

Read full topic

@iTanq wrote:

  1. Equipment Screen, it only shows the default char with no equipment, bonuses are fine.
  2. When wearing the void melee helm, attacking a person or doing an emote will make the char’s head twist in irregular ways.
  3. Dark bow, spec shoots d maces, now that I fixed the d mace model (was dragon head).
  4. I want to find the method which calls for the background to be flipped, where is that?
